title: Video Of Man Dancing With Two Loaded Guns In Haridwar Goes Viral, Probe Ordered
text:
Video Of Man Dancing With Two Loaded Guns In Haridwar Goes Viral, Probe Ordered

Video Of Man Dancing With Two Loaded Guns In Haridwar Goes Viral, Probe Ordered

Flashing guns for a TikTok video or firing one at a baarat has become a worrying trend of late. Wielding a gun is an ostentatious show of power among these people, it seems.

Many don't give two hoots about the consequences they may face while putting out such videos. But such videos don't escape the eyes of cops.

Twitter

More recently, a man dancing with two guns in his hand has gone viral following which police has ordered an investigation to ascertain facts about the same.

In the viral video which has now been taken down, a man can be seen dancing on a Hindi song while carrying two guns. The short video seems to have been shot inside a house, however the date or location of the same remain uncertain at the moment.

Circle officer (CO) Abhay Singh said, "We will investigate the video to find who this person is and when this incident took place. Action will be taken and the person will be arrested based on facts. We will also check if the video is from Haridwar or outside"

In July this year, BJP MLA Pranav Singh Champion had landed in a controversy after a video showing him dancing to a Bollywood number brandishing guns in both his hands hand went viral.

In another incident a man from UP thought dancing in what looks like a baraat while brandishing a loaded gun was a great idea.

But before he knew it, the video went viral and the cops came knocking at his doors.
description: Flashing guns for a tik tok video or firing one at a celebration, especially at weddings has become a worrying trend of late. Weilding a gun is an ostentatious show of power among these people. Many don't give two hoots about the consequences they may face while putting out such videos. But such videos don't escape the eyes of cops.
